Summary: ORB or SPIRT flying in my front yard , Ridgecrest , Ca.
divs: Sighting DetailsI had just walked by my security camaras when this orb or ghost or spirt flew into camaras vision . I never seen it till I played back the video the camara took . Lots of ufo and orb type stuff flying around this house everyday since I pointed my two of my camars to the sky to try and catch that satelite that was suppose to break up on re-entry .
